column1: Uchi////The price may seem a bit steep to some people
column2: but to foodies looking for an experience
column3: Uchi delivers. As someone who goes to Uchi once a month
column4: I am in a gray area for being a regular. Nevertheless
column5: the staff always seems to remember me and treat me like I go there once a day
column7: it seems that most of the other people are receiving excellent service as well (so I guess its not just my award winning personality).
